entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM MST Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
